title: Sian Xiao
text:
Sian Xiao is currently a PhD candidate in Southern Methodist University advised by Dr. Peng Tao from Fall 2020. The estimated graduation time is 2024.
He is working on the combination of computational structural biology and modern machine learning techniques. His research topic covers protein dynamics, protein allostery, and drug desgin.
He is a soccer fan. He also loves traveling and working out.
